tool_description: An API that display new about climate change around the world.
name: Climate Newsfeed
title: Climate Newsfeed

api_list.name: Get Individual Newsfeed
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all newsfeed for a specific source or newspaperId
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-newsfeed.p.rapidapi.com/news/bbc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-newsfeed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-newsfeed.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-newsfeed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Climate Newsfeed
api_list.description: This will return all newsfeed about climate change
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-newsfeed.p.rapidapi.com/news/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-newsfeed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
